column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the vegan ramen here and it is the best Vegan/Veggie Ramen I have ever had. I came down to Houston for a conference
column2: and I have heard wonderful things about JINYA so had to try it. I went with some of my friends too.The service was excellent
column3: our server was kind and found us highly amusing since we all were exhausted and ordered various drinks
column4: some which probably should not have been paired with ramen but he took it in stride. My ramen was excellent
column5: the service was excellent. If you come to Houston JINYA is a MUST.
